class.name: GDSML
class.brief_description: A Godot class that loads a GDSML [i](Godot Scene Markup Language)[/i] file as a scene.

method.name: load_gdsml
method.description: Loads a [b][code].gdsml[/code][/b] file and adds its nodes as children of the given [code]root[/code] node. If a [code].gdss[/code] [i](Godot Stylesheet)[/i] file with the same name exists in the same directory, its styles will be loaded automatically. [codeblock] # Given the following file structure: # ┖ res # ┠ test.gdsml # ┖ test.gdss [/codeblock] [codeblock] var gdsml = GDSML.new() gdsml.load_gdsml("res://test.gdsml", self) # will load test.gdsml and set the styles on test.gdss [/codeblock]
